MWC.GUI.Tools.Chart

Class MoveDirection

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.Tools.PlainTool
      • MWC.GUI.Tools.Chart.MoveDirection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, Tool

    public class MoveDirection
extends PlainTool
    tool to instruct a particular chart to do a resize to fit all of the current data
